title: Artem Nedolya
text:
Artem Nedolya (; born 20 October 1993) is a <a href="Ukrainians">Ukrainian</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>.
Nedolya is a product of Kyiv's different Youth Sportive Schools. His first trainer was Viktor Hryschenko. In 2011, he signed a contract with FC Sevastopol.
